product_name: Big Agnes Air Core Insulated Sleeping Pad
long_description: The Big Agnes Air Core Insulated Sleeping Pad is so light you'll never tire of carrying it into the mountains and it's so comfortable you might want to bring along an alarm clock. PrimaLoft(TM) Synergy synthetic insulation makes this 3-season pad a smart choice for added comfort and warmth on backpacking trips to high elevations. Durable, lightweight nylon diamond ripstop fabric on the top and bottom withstands regular use in the outdoors. Long Wide size pad uses M3 synthetic insulation and features a nylon exterior. 3.25 in. thick pad is waterproof and lightweight; pad packs down to be just a bit larger than a standard Nalgene bottle. Comfort range to 15degF. The Big Agnes Air Core insulated sleeping pad includes a stuff sack and repair kit.
short_description: The Big Agnes Air Core Insulated Sleeping Pad is so light you'll never tire of carrying it into the mountains and it's so comfortable you might want to bring along an alarm clock.
